metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Thindo Vintervur - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group5_Prisoner1 08ed18ea-c679-4845-93ab-a88fe73a2e55 - (-13; 37; 20)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Thindo Vintervur
0.text: My esteemed compatriot - your act of valour will go down in Gondian HISTORY!

1.speaker: Thindo Vintervur
1.text: Thindo Vintervur will NEVER DIE! HA!
